title: 148864230.go To Your Local Best Buy
excerpt: Look around and consider how you'd feel if a fraction of things you could find were made available just ten or twenty years ago.

children.text: Look around and consider how you'd feel if a fraction of things you could find were made available just ten or twenty years ago.
It's mind-boggling. And yet we don't seem to acknowledge it for a second. Too preoccupied with the latest gizmo or gadget, or worse, consumed by the goings-on of our phone’s.
Perhaps you don’t to wait for need newer, better things to make an impact. Just the wherewithall to make something out of what you already have, today.
